content: *we crocheted a smaller version of our humphrey bear with a single strand of comfort™ dk and a larger sized one with a double strand berroco * materials 1 ball berroco comfort dk 50 grs #2703 barley crochet hook size 4 50 mm g for large bear crochet hook size 3 50 mm e for small bear small amount black yarn polyester stuffing tapestry needle use the same directions for both size bears use 2 strands of yarn held decrease and size 4 50 mm g hook for large bear use 1 strand of yarn and size 3 50 mm e hook for small bear
